column3: str
Cassard stands at the entrance to Mord Souq, an eager smile on his face.
Speak with Ghen Gen.
Speak with Rhon Ron, and browse the available wares.
Speak with Ghen Gen.
Mord Souq... Not just full of Mord, but Humes and all manner of others, too! It has long been a refuge for folk displaced by the Flood, so the population is nothing if not diverse.
Oh, have you met a Mord before? They might look like shifty little blighters, but a more welcoming lot you could never wish to meet!
Speaking of which, we should pay our respects to Master Ghen Gen. I'll go ahead and let him know we've arrived.
Go on! Introduce yourself to Master Ghen Gen!
A full Voeburtite honor seems a bit rich for buying a dented pan or a bowl of worms. Did the Exarch lose to you at cards or something!?
Rhon Ron's shop is best for eating! Crack your coinpurse and gorge on the delicious delicacies!
Welcome to Rhon Ron's, traveler! I have wares to empty your purse and fill your belly!
Take your time! Stare and sniff before you choose! But no drooling on the merchandise, yes?

Browse Rhon Ron's wares. You may move the camera as well as zoom in and out. Target a foodstuff and inspect it with <If(Equal(PlayerParameter(80),0))><UIForeground>F20222</UIForeground><UIForeground>01</UIForeground><Else/><CommandIcon(15)/> / <CommandIcon(8)/></If>.
They all look tasty, yes? Which to choose, which to choose!
Which to choose?
Mushloaf.
Everburning Bounty.
Chewy Skewer.
Glazed Wriggler.
Ah, very wise! You won't wither on the sands with a gut full of cactus fruit filling!
You have the gold...?
...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you forty loaves of bread!
Yes, put some spice in your step! You won't feel the cold this night...and probably not the next one either!
You have the gold...?
...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you ten sides of lizard meat!
Mmm, chewy! A quick, easy meal to carry you across the desert!
You have the gold...?
...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you sixty-five skewers!
Too good to resist, eh? (That's what I would've chosen!)
You have the gold...?
...And done! One Voeburtite honor buys you fifteen jars!
Will you eat the lot?
Every last mouthful!
I think I'll...sh-share...the rest...
What an appetite! What a belly! A new legend is born in Mord Souq!
Our visitor invites us to feast! Let us give thanks for <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>his</If> great generosity─and small appetite!
Consider your coinpurse cracked! I am pleased to accept your custom, and Ghen Gen will be pleased that you honored ours!
...Keeping the merchandise down, yes? No returns!
I am honored to have been chosen! Go to Ghen Gen! Let him know that your coinpurse has been most decidedly cracked.
I've never seen anyone eat so much of Rhon Ron's “cuisine” in one sitting... You've a stronger stomach than I!
I was watching from here, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! You honored our custom, and with great relish!
You will always be welcome in Mord Souq─if you need anything in Amh Araeng, we are here to provide!
